com.google.flightmap.android.map
Class MapView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.SurfaceView
          com.google.flightmap.android.map.MapView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
public class MapView
extends android.view.SurfaceView
implements android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback

View for the moving map (as in Model-View-Presenter). Only basic UI actions are done here. Anything requiring non-trival logic should go in MapPresenter.

Magnetic variation does not affect how the map is drawn. It only matters when displaying the numeric track value on the top panel.

See Also:
MapModel, MapPresenter

Nested Class Summary
private  class MapView.PanResetButton
          Custom button to reset from panning.

public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable centerImage(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable image)
Returns image with its bounds set so that when drawn the center of the image will be at the drawing coordinates.

image - the image to center (will be modified by this call).
